data.title: Facebook becomes more powerful even as scandals pile up
data.text: The social network's terrible year is more evidence that no one trusts it.

data.title: Facebook is testing a way to speed up fact checking on the social network
data.text: The company will hire community reviewers as contractors to help fact-checkers.

data.title: Facebook fails to convince lawmakers it needs to track your location at all times
data.text: Facebook told two senators why it tracks users' locations even when their tracking services are turned off.

data.title: Peter Thiel defends Facebook's non-censored political ad policy
data.text: Facebook board member Peter Thiel advises Mark Zuckerberg to not give in to the pressure of changing Facebook's political ad policy. FOX Business' Jackie DeAngelis reports.

data.title: The Wall Street Journal: Trump ally Thiel has advised Facebook’s Zuckerberg not to bar or vet political ads
data.text: Facebook Inc.’s senior leadership is increasingly divided over how to address criticism of the company’s effect on U.S.

data.title: Facebook: Undervalued And Setting Up To Break Previous Highs
data.text: Facebook: Undervalued And Setting Up To Break Previous Highs

data.title: Peter Thiel reportedly pushed Facebook not to vet fake political ads
data.text: Billionaire investor Peter Thiel has reportedly bumped heads with other Facebook directors over his conservative political views.

data.title: Facebook's terrible year is more evidence that no one trusts it
data.text: Still, the social network grows more powerful.

data.title: Room to Run? Examinng the tech sector with Dan Ives
data.text: Daniel Ives, managing director of equity research at Wedbush Securities, talks the performance of the tech sector over the last decade, and provides his outlook for 2020.

data.title: A WhatsApp security flaw could have been exploited by hackers to create ‘mass chaos,’ say researchers
data.text: Such an attack would have given hackers access to chat messages and related content such as audio, video, photos, and the users’ phone contacts.
